name: symphony_api
brief:
Internal API header (legacy, includes sym_master.h)

This header provides the internal API declarations using the
PROTO() macro for K&R C compatibility. Modern code should use
symphony.h which provides the same functions with standard
ANSI C prototypes.

**Included headers:**
- sym_proto.h: PROTO() macro definition
- sym_master.h: Master process data structures
- sym_messages.h: Message type definitions

@note Prefer using symphony.h for new code
see: symphony.h for the modern public API
